title: Tomato Sauce with Onion
introduction: The natural sugar in the onion complements the sweetness of the butter in this sauce. This sauce is also good made with shallots in place of the onion.
ingredients: 3 pounds plum tomatoes, peeled, seeded, and chopped, or 1 (28-ounce) can imported Italian peeled tomatoes with their juice, passed through a food mill
Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
instructions: In a medium, heavy saucepan, melt the butter with the oil over medium heat. Add the onion and cook, stirring once or twice, until the onion is tender and golden, about 7 minutes.
Add the tomatoes and salt and pepper. Bring the sauce to a simmer and cook 20 minutes or until thickened.
